document_data.name: Featherfoot
document_data.mainbody: '''''False tracks''''' was a common [[alteration]] spell used by [[ninja]]s to move stealthily. The spell was very rare outside [[Kara-Tur]].
document_data.Effects: When cast, the spell allowed a ninja to move in silence. The ninja would not leave any footprints, and did not trigger traps that operated using a pressure or weight trigger. The spell required the ninja to move slowly; if they moved faster than walking pace, the spell was broken. The reverse of this spell was ''[[leadfoot]]''.
document_data.Components: The spell required only a [[somatic component|somatic]] component, [[kuji-kiri]] hand gestures.
